T02TD1359E:134a-6: mngal du mngal gnas nyid dang skye ba'i dus dang byis pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyis mi bzad sdug bsngal lo //
T02TD1359E:134a-7: gzhon nu lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang bkra shis 'dod pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen pos gang //
T02TD1359E:134a-8: rga dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dag ste slar yang du 'bong la sogs 'gro drug 'jigs ster ba //
T02TD1359E:134a-9: 'gro ba 'di rnams ma lus sgyu ma la rmongs gyur pas sdug bsngal ba las sdug bsngal 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1359E:134a-10: 'khor ba'i nang nas gal te mi nyid dag tu gyur kyang chos kyi blo ni brgya lam zhig la'o //
T02TD1359E:134a-11: de las dge ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid la rjes chags gyur kyang dang po'i theg par rab tu 'jug / de las dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg pa dang ni ma lus snying po sgom pa'i blo 'jug brgya lam na'o //
T02TD1359E:134a-12: de las sangs rgyas nyid de 'dod chags bde ba'i go 'phong la 'jug ae ma'o shin tu dka'o //
T02TD1359E:134a-14: bskal ba bye ba grangs med par //
T02TD1359E:134a-15: gang gis sngon du sdig byas pa //
T02TD1359E:134a-17: de rnams ma lus zad par /
T02TD1359E:134a-19: / gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02TD1359E:134a-20: blo gros shin tu dri med pas //
T02TD1359E:134a-21: sdug bsngal rnams la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1359E:134a-22: ngan song skye ba 'joms par byed //
T02TD1359E:134a-23: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1359E:134a-24: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02TD1359E:134a-25: gang zhig rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02TD1359E:134a-26: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kyis ;
T02TD1359E:134a-27: / thams cad yongs su gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1359E:134a-28: bdag nyid chen por bskyed pa des //
T02TD1359E:134a-29: khyed rnams theg pa chen po la //
T02TD1359E:134a-30: legs par bgrod par 'gyur ba yis //
T02TD1359E:134a-31: de phyir 'di ni lam gyi mchog / theg chen 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pas //
T02TD1359E:134a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD1359E:134a-35: de nas de nyid yi ge drug gis bsrungs la bzlas pa'i don du de nyid byin te nang par snga bar rmi lam smros shig //
T02TD1359E:134a-36: ces bsgo nas yol ba'i phyi rol lam /
T02TD1359E:134a-37: gnas gzhan du seng ge ltar nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:134a-38: 'di ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:134b-0: @134b de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su //
T02TD1359E:134b-1: aom ho badzra ka ma la da la garbhe sha y+ee badzra su kha ma h'a ni tram ka ro mi ya th'a t'a th'a ga te /
T02TD1359E:134b-2: na kri t'a ha: h'a sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:134b-3: zhes pas nya las lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD1359E:134b-4: slob dpon nyal ba ni nub tu mgo bo dang shar du rkang pa'o //
T02TD1359E:134b-5: gal te bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rmi lam brtags pas /
T02TD1359E:134b-6: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1359E:134b-7: lha mo'i tshogs kyi la gag la pi wang la sogs pa gzung ba mthong bas dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1359E:134b-8: yang na rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams thod pa dang gri gug phyag na gzung ba dang /
T02TD1359E:134b-9: khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyis bdud dang bgegs dang log par 'dren pa la sogs pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang /
T02TD1359E:134b-10: srung ba'i 'khor lo byed pa mthong na dge ba'o //
T02TD1359E:134b-11: 'on te gang yang ma mthong na 'bring po'o //
T02TD1359E:134b-12: 'on te bdud kyi tshogs rnams bkres pa dang /
T02TD1359E:134b-13: skom pa dang lus rid pa skams pa rnams kyi lag na thod pa dang gri gug gzung ba rnams ni skye bo dam pa rnams la bya ba ma yin pa byed par 'dod pas /
T02TD1359E:134b-14: slob dpon nam slob mas mthong na ngan pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1359E:134b-15: de lta bu mthong na slob dpon nyal sa spes te /
T02TD1359E:134b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi sa gzhi la bsdad la srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1359E:134b-17: yang de rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas gtor ma chen po sbyin par bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:134b-18: de yang aom phrem badzra d'a ki n'i badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri ga ga na sva bh'a wa sarba dra by'a ni bi sho dha ni sarba dra by'a bi sho dha ya h'um phrem phat /
T02TD1359E:134b-19: ces pa ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gtor ma sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1359E:134b-20: de nas sangs rgyas rnams spyan drang bar bya ba ni sangs rgyas yab dang yum du bcas par gyur pa dang /
T02TD1359E:134b-21: sras bcas 'khor rnams lhan cig grogs dang 'brel pa rnams //
T02TD1359E:134b-22: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnams 'dus pas bskor ba yis /
T02TD1359E:134b-23: dgyes gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog nyid gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1359E:134b-24: zhes pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi khams la gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:134b-25: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di lta ste /
T02TD1359E:134b-26: aom ha h'a hi h'i badzra bhee ra ba a'a krsha ya a'a ka rsha ya /
T02TD1359E:134b-27: pra we sha ya pra we sha ya /
T02TD1359E:134b-29: to sha ya to sha ya /
T02TD1359E:135a-1: hri da yam h'um h'um phrem phrem phat /
T02TD1359E:135a-3: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma dri dang /
T02TD1359E:135a-8: 'bras bu ma nyams pa rnams dang bcas pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas sbyin par byas pas phyi rol gyi dur khrod kyis gzhi la bza' ba dang btung ba byed par bsam mo //
T02TD1359E:135a-9: de nas bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa bzhi bar bya ba'i don du rkang ba bcu drug pa dang phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pa ste /
T02TD1359E:135a-10: cho ga 'di thig 'debs ba'i skabs su yang go bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:135a-11: 'di ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:135a-12: de nas nang par snga bar rdo rje slob dpon gyis gtor ma gtang ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas 'thon la slob ma rnams la rmi lam dri bar bya ste /
T02TD1359E:135a-13: mi dge na phreng ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrung ngo //
T02TD1359E:135a-14: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par 'jug pa'i dus su bdud la sogs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i cho gas srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du song bas /
T02TD1359E:135a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor la dmigs pa dang /
T02TD1359E:135a-16: yan lag drug dgod pa dang /
T02TD1359E:135a-17: phyag rgya drug dang phyag rgya bzhi dgod par byas la /
T02TD1359E:135a-18: de nas slob ma rnams kyis /
T02TD1359E:135a-19: aom pra we sha bha ga w'a a ma h'a su kha mo ksha su ram sarba siddhi su kha pra dam par ma su kha autta ma siddhya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD1359E:135a-21: zhes pas gsol ba btab la /
T02TD1359E:135a-22: 'jug pa ni bskor ba byas te nub sgo ru bsdad nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo dbye ba la sogs pa'i sngags 'di lta ste /
T02TD1359E:135a-24: sa ma ya pre be sha ya h'um /
T02TD1359E:135a-26: de nas dkyil 'khor la me tog gi phreng ba 'bul ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD1359E:135a-27: aom par ma ma h'a su kh'a sha ya su la l'i ta bi l'a sa mi ta na mi te rna m'a mi bha ga w'a ntam dza: h'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi h'i: pra t'i tstsha ku su ma aanydza lim n'a tha ho:/
T02TD1359E:135a-29: slar blangs te rang gi spyi bor bcing ngo //
T02TD1359E:135a-30: de nas 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i gtso bo bla mar dmigs la dbang bskur ba don du gnyer bas gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags kyi tshig ni /
T02TD1359E:135a-31: aom ham h'am him h'im hr'im hr'im hum hlim hl'im /
T02TD1359E:135a-32: a'a a'i r'i a'u l'i badzra da ki n+yo badzr'a mri ta gha te /
T02TD1359E:135a-33: aa bhi shi nytsa tu m'am sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:135a-34: aom aam aim ri aum lim sarba buddha badzra mu ku tam ma ma banytsa buddha a'a tma ma kam bandha yantu hum h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-0: aom aa a'a aam aa: ha h'a ham ha: phrem ho: @135b sarba p'a ra mi t'a ma ma badzra pa tam bandha yantu hum h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-2: bi dny'a na sva bh'a bee k'a ru n'a pra dznya' a'a tma ke badzra badzra gha nte sabya au tta ra ka ra yo rma ma badzra sa tv'a: sa pra dznyo da d'a tu h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-3: aom aa a'a ae a'i yar 'a ra ao aoo aal a'al aam a'am /
T02TD1359E:135b-4: sarba bo dhi sa tva: bh'a ry'a: sarba d'a sa tva: sabh'a rya': sarba d'a sarba k'a ma au ba bho gam badzra pra tam ma m'a d'a d'a ntu sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:135b-5: aom ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la l'a sarba kro dha r'a dz'a:/
T02TD1359E:135b-7: me tri ka' ru n'a ma di ta au pe ksh'a sarba sa ma tva sva bh'a wam badzra p'urbam ga ma n'a ma me d'a d'a ntu hum h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-8: aom ae padma badzra tsi hnoo pra dznyoo ba aoo mandala /
T02TD1359E:135b-9: aa dhi pa t'i badzra su kha dzny'a n'a ga ma ma dad t'am hi ha: hum h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-11: de nas dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:135b-12: de nas dbang bdun thob par nga rgyal bskyed pa ni /
T02TD1359E:135b-13: aom sarba t'a th'a ga ta sa pta aa bhi sha ka sa pta bh'u mu prva pto ham:/
T02TD1359E:135b-15: dbang bdun rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1359E:135b-16: de nas yang sngags pas bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang gong ma don du gnyir par bya ba'i tshig 'di lta ste /
T02TD1359E:135b-17: aom aom pra dzny'a au pa yoo ka la sha aa bhi she kam med da d'a t'am hum h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-18: aom a'a: pradzny'a au p'a yo gu hya aa bhi she kam med da d'a t'am hum h'u phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-19: aom h'um pra dny'a au p'a yoo badzra sa tva bi shva ma' ta ro pradzny'a dznya' na aa bhi she kam me dang d'a tvam h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-20: ces pas gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD1359E:135b-21: de nas 'chad par 'gyur pa'i cho gas bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD1359E:135b-22: de nas de ltar bsam nas /
T02TD1359E:135b-23: aom aom badzra sa tve na badzra ka la sha aa bhi she ke na aa bhi shi kto badzra btva tsal'a bh'u mi lam dho ham /
T02TD1359E:135b-24: aom a'a: badzra tve na gu hya aa bhi she ke na aa bhi shi kto badza sa tva yu wa r'a dzo na wa bh'u mi lab dho ham /
T02TD1359E:135b-25: aom bh'um badzra te na pra dzny'a dzny'a ni na aa bhi she ke na aa bhi shi kto dvi t'i ya badzra dha ro ham dha rmm'a me gha bh'u mi lab dho ham /
T02TD1359E:135b-26: zhes pas dbang gong ma'i nga rgyal bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1359E:135b-27: de nas dbang gong ma bas kyang gong ma'i dbang bzhi pa'i man ngag don du gnyer ba'i sngags kyi tshig 'di lta ste /
T02TD1359E:135b-28: aom ho pradzny'a au p'a ya a'a tma kam /
T02TD1359E:135b-29: badzra sa tva ma h'a mu dr'a dznya' na aa bhi she kam mi pra yatstsha aom a'a: h'um ho phat /
T02TD1359E:135b-30: cas pas gsol ba btab nas bdag nyid dri ma dang bral ba'i dbang bskur bar bsams la /
T02TD1359E:135b-31: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:135b-32: aom ho dha rmm'a dh'a ya ksha ra tsa tu rtha aa bhi she ke na /
T02TD1359E:135b-33: aa bhi shi kto badzra sa tve na a'a tma n'a h'am /
T02TD1359E:136a-0: gnyis pas bcu gnyis pa thob pa rdo rje sems dpa' don chen po mchog tu mi 'gyur ba 'jig @136a * //
T02TD1359E:136a-1: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa /
T02TD1359E:136a-2: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo ae wam yi ge zhes bya ste /
T02TD1359E:136a-3: dbang gong ma las kyang gong ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1359E:136a-4: de nas slob dpon gyi bya ba thams cad la /
T02TD1359E:136a-5: rjes su gnang ba thob nas slob ma la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:136a-6: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin /
T02TD1359E:136a-7: de kho na nyid kyi bstod pa sngon du song bas /
T02TD1359E:136a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub 'dod pa pos bden pa'i byin brlabs bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD1359E:136a-9: nam mkha' las ni byung dang mtshungs //
T02TD1359E:136a-10: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1359E:136a-11: dngos grub kun gyi dam pa stsol //
T02TD1359E:136a-12: mi bskyod rdo rje'i dngos grub ni //
T02TD1359E:136a-13: dbang po chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1359E:136a-14: rgyal ba rdo rje thams cad 'dzin //
T02TD1359E:136a-15: bdag la dngos grub mchog 'gyur stsol //
T02TD1359E:136a-16: skyon rnams spangs pa'i rtag pa nyid //
T02TD1359E:136a-17: chags pa che las rjes su chags //
T02TD1359E:136a-18: chags pa chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD1359E:136a-19: de nyid dngos grub bdag la stsol //
T02TD1359E:136a-20: shin tu dag pa'i chos kyi mchog / sngon du grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1359E:136a-21: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag / byang chub sems kyi dngos grub stsol //
T02TD1359E:136a-22: dbang po chen po phyag rgya che //
T02TD1359E:136a-23: rdo rje'i dngos grub mchog chen po //
T02TD1359E:136a-24: dngos grub kun gyi dam pa nyid //
T02TD1359E:136a-25: sna tshogs yum gyi yab kyis stsol //
T02TD1359E:136a-26: sems can kun gyi yid la khyab //
T02TD1359E:136a-27: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD1359E:136a-28: sems can kun gyi yab gyur pa //
T02TD1359E:136a-29: 'dod pa'i rtse mo dam tshig che //
T02TD1359E:136a-30: bden pa'i ye shes mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1359E:136a-31: shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1359E:136a-32: bden pas bdag la mgon po kye //
T02TD1359E:136a-33: 'dod pa yongs su gnang bar mdzod /
T02TD1359E:136a-35: 'di ni slob dpon bdag 'jug gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:136a-36: de nas slob ma lhag par gnas pa byas pa rnams khrus byas te /
T02TD1359E:136a-37: dri zhim po la sogs pas dag par byas nas brtul zhugs blang bar bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:136a-38: gsod dang mi bden pa dang gzhan gyi bud med rnams spang de bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag kyang ste //
T02TD1359E:136a-39: 'khor bar rdo rje'i zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams //
T02TD1359E:136a-40: gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'i //
T02TD1359E:136b-0: sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyed @136b rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar gyis //
T02TD1359E:136b-1: rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang //
T02TD1359E:136b-2: ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya //
T02TD1359E:136b-3: grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun dbyugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang //
T02TD1359E:136b-4: dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02TD1359E:136b-6: de nas yol ba'i phyi rol du slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor dmigs la /
T02TD1359E:136b-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nuttara bo dhi aa lam ka ra bsta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD1359E:136b-8: zhes pas smad g-yogs bcing ngo //
T02TD1359E:136b-9: aom badzra raksha ham zhes pas stod g-yogs la'o //
T02TD1359E:136b-10: aom badzra aushn'i sha h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:136b-12: aom dv'a da sha am gi ka ni ro dha ri ne h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:136b-13: ces pas mig ras bcing ngo //
T02TD1359E:136b-15: zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD1359E:136b-16: de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor du 'jug yon phul ba dang /
T02TD1359E:136b-17: rnam par rgyal ba'i dung gi chus gtor te /
T02TD1359E:136b-18: snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams su gdan gyi steng du yi ge gsum gyi 'od zer gyis lus dri ma med par byas te /
T02TD1359E:136b-19: h'um zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgo ru gnas pa las kyi rdo rjes gzung ba dang /
T02TD1359E:136b-20: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dri bar bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:136b-21: kye ho bu sdug khyod su yin zhes pa'i lan /
T02TD1359E:136b-22: bde chen skal ldan bdag lags so zhes pa brjod na /
T02TD1359E:136b-23: de nyid brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD1359E:136b-24: aom sarba yo gtsitta auta p'a da y'a mi /
T02TD1359E:136b-25: zhes pas byang chub kyi sems bskyed la me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD1359E:136b-26: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho singnghi badzra ya th'a su kham ;
T02TD1359E:136b-27: zhes pa brjod cing rdo rje la 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD1359E:136b-29: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pas khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dkyil 'khor mi mthong pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig ces brjod la /
T02TD1359E:136b-30: aom bigha n'anta kri ta h'um /
T02TD1359E:136b-34: zhes pas yol ba'i nang du bcug ste /
T02TD1359E:136b-35: aom ma h'a ra ta su to shya su su kho badzra sa tva a'arya siddhya mam /
T02TD1359E:136b-36: zhes brjod cing bskor ba bya'o //
T02TD1359E:136b-37: de nas thal mo sbyar la shar sgo nas brjod pa /
T02TD1359E:137a-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a au pasth'a na ya a'atma nam @137a * //
T02TD1359E:137a-1: n'i ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra stva aa dhi tishtha m'am /
T02TD1359E:137a-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a karma ne a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1359E:137a-3: sarba tth'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru mam zhes pas so //
T02TD1359E:137a-4: de nas lho phyogs nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka ya a'atma nam niry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1359E:137a-5: sarba ta th'a gta badzra rtn'a bhi shinytsa mam zhes pas so //
T02TD1359E:137a-6: de nas nub phyogs nas aom sarba buddha p'u dza au pa sth'a n'a ya a'atma nam niry'a ta ya mam sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bee ro tsa na aa dhi tishtha mam zhes pas so //
T02TD1359E:137a-7: de nas byang phyogs nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra wa rta n'a ya a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharmma pra wa rta yamam zhes pas so //
T02TD1359E:137a-8: de nas yang shar phyogs su 'ongs nas aom gu ru tsa ra na au pa sth'a n'a ya a'atma nan ni ry'a ta y'ami aom sarba sa tva pa ri tr'a n'a ya /
T02TD1359E:137a-9: a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a m'i /
T02TD1359E:137a-10: zhes pa'i don go bar byas la klag tu gzhug go //
T02TD1359E:137a-12: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs pas de'i phyir rdo rje ye shes skyed do //
T02TD1359E:137a-13: ye shes des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos ;
T02TD1359E:137a-14: gal te khyod kyi dam tshig 'das na sdug bsngal chen po ster bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi sngon du smra bar mi bya'o zhes brjod de /
T02TD1359E:137a-15: mgo la rdo rje bzhag la dril bu dkrol zhing brjod pa /
T02TD1359E:137a-16: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD1359E:137a-17: gal te smras na mgo bo 'gems //
T02TD1359E:137a-18: zhes pa go bar byas la /
T02TD1359E:137a-19: snying gar rdo rje gzung ste /
T02TD1359E:137a-20: aom dus kyi 'khor lo khyod nyid kyi //
T02TD1359E:137a-21: snying la yang dag gnas pa ste //
T02TD1359E:137a-22: gal te gzhan la smras pa na //
T02TD1359E:137a-23: de ma thag tu dran te gshegs //
T02TD1359E:137a-24: zhes pa'i bka' stsal byin la rnam rgyal gyi dung mthe bong dang srin lag gis blangs te /
T02TD1359E:137a-25: de yi khar sbyin par bya zhing //
T02TD1359E:137a-26: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1359E:137a-27: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD1359E:137a-28: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob //
T02TD1359E:137a-29: 'thung cig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu //
T02TD1359E:137a-30: zhes brjod cing mna' chu blud do //
T02TD1359E:137a-31: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dus kyi 'khor lo nga yin pas gang bsgo ba khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02TD1359E:137a-32: de phyir bag dang ldan par gyis shig / mi mthun pas rkyen byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar ma byed cig ces brjod do //
T02TD1359E:137a-33: 'di ni dam tshig gi chu'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1359E:137a-34: de nas dngos grub nges pa'i don du bsgrub pa sngon du byas la mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma la lha dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-0: de yang 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor @137b la gnas la bzlas pa dang /
T02TD1359E:137b-1: sbyin sreg gis mnyes par bya ste /
T02TD1359E:137b-2: dbab pa'i nus pa dang ldan pas /
T02TD1359E:137b-3: slob ma mdun du bzhag la skad cig gis stong par btang ba'i rjes la aa yig las 'od dpag tu med par bskyed de /
T02TD1359E:137b-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shtsa aa dhi tishtha na tam k'a la tsa gro me a'a we sha tu /
T02TD1359E:137b-6: de'i lte bar lam las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po 'khor los mtshan pa dus me'i steng du ho ser po'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-7: snying gar yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor g-yo ba'i ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa nag po gzhu'i rnam pa sgra gcan gyi steng du h'um nag po'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-8: mgrin par ram yig las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po rin po ches mtshan pa nyi ma'i steng du a'a: dmar po'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-9: dpral bar wam yig las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar ba bum pas mtshan pa zla ba'i steng du aom dkar po rnam par bsgoms te /
T02TD1359E:137b-10: bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku'i rdo rje rnams spyan drangs la rim pa bzhin du ho hum a'a: aom rnams la thim par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-11: de nas rkang pa dag gi 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis sbar ba'i ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor ram gyis mtshan pa dmar po gru gsum pa steng du ddzhee:yig ste de dag gi 'od zer gyis bskyod pas ho la sogs pa'i 'od zer yang bskyod nas lus kun yongs su gang bar bsgom zhing /
T02TD1359E:137b-12: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i bdug spos kyis bdug cing dril bu dkrol te /
T02TD1359E:137b-13: aom aa ra ra ra ra la la la la badzra a'a we sha ya h'um /
T02TD1359E:137b-15: 'di'i 'bras bu rgyud du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-16: de nas aom a'a: hum ho /
T02TD1359E:137b-17: zhes pa'i sngags kyis me tog mgo la bzhag na babs pa de gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1359E:137b-21: aom h'um ham rnams thabs kyi'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-25: ho: a'a: ksha: rnams shes rab rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-26: 'di ni dbab pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:137b-27: de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor la lta ru bcug la mig sngar cir snang dris nas /
T02TD1359E:137b-28: kha dog gi dbye bas phrin las kyi dbye ba go bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:138a-0: de nas mthe bong gnyis lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa bzung la rdo rje'i gar bya zhing rtsa ba'i sngags sam yi ge drug pa bzlas shing bskor ba @138a * //
T02TD1359E:138a-2: bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:138a-4: bdag gis slob ma bcug pa yi //
T02TD1359E:138a-5: bsod nams gang gis 'di la mdzod //
T02TD1359E:138a-6: lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa yis //
T02TD1359E:138a-8: gang du lhung bde yi rigs //
T02TD1359E:138a-9: gang gis bsod nams nus pa yis //
T02TD1359E:138a-11: 'di ni mig ras dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:138a-12: de nas sngon gyi me tog gi phreng ba las me tog gcig phyung ste snyim pa rnam par dag pa'i don du me tog de'i snyim par byin la slob ma de nyid kyi yi ge sbar bar byas pa'i sdig pa rnam par dag par bsam mo //
T02TD1359E:138a-13: slob dpon gyis kyang de ltar byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD1359E:138a-14: de nas dad pa dang mos pa sngon du song bas /
T02TD1359E:138a-15: mdun na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te dkyil 'khor de ru 'jug par bsams la /
T02TD1359E:138a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ku la bi shodha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:138a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mtshan ma rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du gzhag pa la'am /
T02TD1359E:138a-19: thang ka la dor ba ste /
T02TD1359E:138a-20: de dang dus mtshungs su mig ras bshu bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:138a-21: gal te sngon du me tog dor nas /
T02TD1359E:138a-22: de nas bshu na sngags 'di brjod pa ste /
T02TD1359E:138a-23: aom de bya aindra y'a ni aunggha ta ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:138a-24: zhes pas mig dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:138a-25: me tog gang lhung ba de nyid rigs kyi lha'o //
T02TD1359E:138a-26: rigs kyi lha de nyid kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1359E:138a-27: me tog de nyid blangs la phreng ba la btags te /
T02TD1359E:138a-28: aom pra ti grihna tva mi mam sa tva ba la zhes pas slob ma'i mgo la gdags so //
T02TD1359E:138a-29: de nas kyee rdo rje ltos shig ces brjod la ;
T02TD1359E:138a-30: lha rnams kyi ming sngon du song bas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la sogs pa bstan pa dang brjod pa /
T02TD1359E:138a-32: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02TD1359E:138a-33: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su 'gro //
T02TD1359E:138a-34: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1359E:138a-35: dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02TD1359E:138a-36: dam tshig mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1359E:138a-37: rdo rje padma mchog la rol //
T02TD1359E:138a-38: sngags rnams la ni brtson par gyis //
T02TD1359E:138a-39: zhes pas go bar byas la /
T02TD1359E:138a-40: aom badzra mandala ma h'a mandala ma pra wishto ham /
T02TD1359E:138a-41: yo ga mandala la ma h'a mandala m'a da risha to ham /
T02TD1359E:138a-42: gu hya mandala la ma h'a mandala dkshi to ham /
T02TD1359E:138b-0: zhes brjod la dam tshig @138b brjod pa /
T02TD1359E:138b-1: ho: ho: zhes pa 'di ni me tog dor ba dang /
T02TD1359E:138b-2: slob ma la dkyil 'khor bstan cing gzhug pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:138b-3: de nas chu la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i don du bla ma'i sngun du slob ma pus mo sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD1359E:138b-4: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1359E:138b-5: dbang mchog dam pa byin pa ltar ;
T02TD1359E:138b-6: / bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1359E:138b-7: nam mkha' rdor sogs deng bdag stsol //
T02TD1359E:138b-8: zhes brjod la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02TD1359E:138b-9: de nas slob dpon gyis gsung bar 'gyur ba'i rim pas shar gyi sgo ru rnam par bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:138b-10: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i lag pa g-yon pa nas bskyod cing las kyi rdo rje dang bcas pas bskor ba bya zhing byang sgor khrid la /
T02TD1359E:138b-12: de'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis phyogs kun na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD1359E:138b-13: rig pa'i lha mo rnams spyan drangs te /
T02TD1359E:138b-14: mchod nas slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i don du /
T02TD1359E:138b-15: sangs rgyas rnams la rdor 'chang gis //
T02TD1359E:138b-16: dbang bskur bzhin du 'gro ba rnams //
T02TD1359E:138b-17: bsgral phyir yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD1359E:138b-18: de ltar 'di la gnang bar zhu //
T02TD1359E:138b-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dang bcas pa chags pa chen pos zhu ste /
T02TD1359E:138b-21: rnam par snang mdzad kyi lam nas zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1359E:138b-22: rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste zhu ba de yang slob ma'i zhal nas zhugs pas lha mo'i padma na gnas pa skad cig gis sku rdo rje shes rab dang bcas pa'i gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1359E:138b-23: yang zhal dang phyag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i cha byad can padma nas 'thon pa la spyan ma la sogs pa dang bcas pa nam mkha'i khams gang bar gnas pas gdugs dang /
T02TD1359E:138b-32: me tog la sogs pa'i char dang /
T02TD1359E:138b-33: byang chub sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa dkar po phyag gis bzung bas /
T02TD1359E:138b-34: slob ma de yang padma nas phyung ba la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1359E:138b-35: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa lha mo rnams kyis brjod pa /
T02TD1359E:138b-36: bkra shis gang gis sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD1359E:138b-37: sems can ma lus rang bzhin kun mkhyen mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1359E:138b-38: skyed byed kyis bskyed bde chen ji lta ba bzhin du //
T02TD1359E:139a-1: gi mchog gis 'dir ni bkra shis rtsol //
T02TD1359E:139a-2: dpal dang ldan pa ri bong dang ni mtshungs pa yi //
T02TD1359E:139a-3: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum dang bral //
T02TD1359E:139a-4: mtsho las byung ba'i padma dang mtshungs sangs rgyas spyan //
T02TD1359E:139a-5: de yi bkra shis zhi bar byed pa de stsal cig / de yis gsungs pa'i rab mchog g-yo ba med pa yi /
T02TD1359E:139a-6: mi dang lha yi mchod gnas 'jig rten gsum du grags //
T02TD1359E:139a-7: chos kyi mchog tu gyur pas 'gro rnams zhi bar mdzod //
T02TD1359E:139a-8: de yi bkra shis zhi bar byed pa de stsol cig / dam pa'i chos dang ldan zhir thos pa'i bkra shis ldan //
T02TD1359E:139a-9: dge 'dun mi dang lha dang lha min yon 'bras ster //
T02TD1359E:139a-10: gang zhig dpal ldan gnas pa'i tshogs kyi mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1359E:139a-11: de yi bkra shis zhi bar byed pa de stsol cig / ces pa'i bkra shis kyi klu 'di yis nye bar byed pa ste /
T02TD1359E:139a-12: bdag nyid la sogs pas kyang ngo //
T02TD1359E:139a-13: de nas lus dag pa'i don du sgrol ma la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bum pa thams cad nas chu blangs te /
T02TD1359E:139a-14: rnam rgyal gyi dung phor du blugs nas gtsug tor dang /
T02TD1359E:139a-15: dpung pa'i tshigs g-yas pa dang /
T02TD1359E:139a-17: de ltar dpyi mgo'i tshigs dag las /
T02TD1359E:139a-18: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD1359E:139a-19: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1359E:139a-20: gsang ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD1359E:139a-21: byin cig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD1359E:139a-23: aom a'a a'i r'i a'u l'i panytsa dh'a tu bi shodha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:139a-24: zhes brjod cing rnam rgyal gyi dung phor gyi chus dbang bskur ba ni khams lnga lha mo lngar bskyed pas so //
T02TD1359E:139a-25: de nas cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba la yang gnas lngar sngags 'dis dbang bskur ba ni phung po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bskyed pas /
T02TD1359E:139a-26: aom aa a'i ri au li panytsa ta th'a ga ta pa ri shuddha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:139a-29: gser ram ras las byung ba'i cod pan la sngags 'di brjod de mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:139a-30: de ltar dbang gnyis kyis khams dang phung po rnam par dag pa ni lus yongs su dag pa ste //
T02TD1359E:139a-31: 'di ni chu dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1359E:139a-32: de nas g-yas su bskor te /
T02TD1359E:139a-33: lho sgor khrid la gong ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i slob ma la ngag rnam par dag pa'i don du gsung rdo rje'i gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa la dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che zhes pa la sogs pa brjod la /
T02TD1359E:139b-0: aom aa a'a am aa: ha h'a ham ha: phre ho:da sha pa ri mi ta @139b pa ri p'u ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:139b-1: zhes pa'i sngags kyis gnas lngar dbang bskur ba ni rlung bcu lha mo bcu ru bskyed pas so //
T02TD1359E:139b-2: de nas rin po che'am gser gyi dar dpyangs sam me tog gi phreng ba dpral ba la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:139b-3: de nas de ltar gsol ba btab la rtsa gnyis yab yum gnyis su bskyed pas /
T02TD1359E:139b-5: s'u rya tsandra bi shodha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:139b-6: zhes pa'i sngags kyis rdo rje dang dril bu mgo la bzhag la gnas lngar dbang bskur ba 'di dag gis rlung dang rtsa dag pa ngag rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD1359E:139b-7: dar dpyangs dang rdo rje dril bu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:139b-8: de nas g-yas skor gyis shar sgor rdo rje sor gdub byin la shar gyi zhal du yid rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir snga ma ltar gsol ba btab la thugs rdo rje'i gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa la /
T02TD1359E:139b-9: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1359E:139b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02TD1359E:139b-11: kun du bzang po kun rang bzhin //
T02TD1359E:139b-12: sna tshogs yum gyi bdag po mchog /
T02TD1359E:139b-13: ces pas bcom ldan 'das dang po'i skyes bu go bar byas te /
T02TD1359E:139b-14: aom aa a'a ae ae ar a'r ao aoo al a'al am aa:bisha ya ainidra ya bi shodha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:139b-15: zhes pa'i sngags kyis de kho na'i rang bzhin rdo rje byin la de nas lngar dbang bskur ba ni dbang po dang yul rnams sems dpa' dang sems mar bskyed pas so //
T02TD1359E:139b-16: de nas rna ba la sogs pa la me tog byin nas /
T02TD1359E:139b-17: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba ni gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD1359E:139b-19: de'i yul rnams khro bo dang khro mor bskyed pas /
T02TD1359E:139b-20: aom ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la l'a tsa tur brahma bi h'a ra bi shuddha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:139b-21: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gnas lngar dbang bskur la /
T02TD1359E:139b-22: de nas lag pa dang rkang pa rnams la lag gdub bam /
T02TD1359E:139b-23: me tog gi phreng ba bcings la /
T02TD1359E:139b-24: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton nas /
T02TD1359E:139b-25: srid pa mchog tu zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD1359E:139b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1359E:139b-27: bdag gis khyod ni lung bstan bgyi //
T02TD1359E:139b-28: sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhya sa ma ya shvam bhu rbh'u wa sva:/
T02TD1359E:139b-29: zhes brjod pa ni me tog lhung ba'i sgo nas rang gi rigs kyi ming gis lung bstan pa ni /
T02TD1359E:139b-41: sa h'a dza badzra zhes pa rje sems dpa'i ming gi bye brag ste /
T02TD1359E:140a-1: rdo rje kun la go bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:140a-2: mi bskyod pa'i h'a sa dang /
T02TD1359E:140a-32: m'a ma zhes pa rnams so //
T02TD1359E:140a-50: su ra ta aom ku ra dang /
T02TD1359E:140a-51: ka ru na aom ku ra dang /
T02TD1359E:140a-53: su ra ta aa nnta dang /
T02TD1359E:140a-57: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i /
T02TD1359E:140a-67: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i /
T02TD1359E:140a-73: badzra a'a k'a sa ra ti /
T02TD1359E:140a-88: badzra na rtye shva r'i dang /
T02TD1359E:140a-90: badzra rati zhes pa rnams so //
T02TD1359E:140a-91: spyan ma'i d'a ki n'i dang /
T02TD1359E:140a-95: badzra mo ha ra zhes pa rnams so //
T02TD1359E:140a-105: zhes pa rnams kyi dang po rdo rje dang ldan par byas te /
T02TD1359E:140a-106: 'di rnams kyis yid rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs dang ming gi dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:140a-107: de nas de ltar g-yas skor du khrid la nub kyi zhal du ye shes dag pa'i don du slob mas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD1359E:140b-0: ye shes rdo rje'i sku ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa ye shes dang rnam par shes @140b pa yab yum gnyis su bskyed la /
T02TD1359E:140b-1: aom ham ksha: dzny'ana bi shuddha dha rmm'a tsa kra pra k'a sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:140b-3: dharmm'a'i gnas su badzra dang khadga dang /
T02TD1359E:140b-6: padma rnams bcug la lan lnga ru brjod cing /
T02TD1359E:140b-7: gnas lnga ru dbang bskur ba ye shes rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD1359E:140b-8: de nas slob ma stan la bsdad pa la bh'um las byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo /
T02TD1359E:140b-11: rkang pa dag la byin nas /
T02TD1359E:140b-12: dbyangs yig tha ma las byung ba'i dung /
T02TD1359E:140b-13: aom badzra bh'a sha ram zhes brjod de /
T02TD1359E:140b-14: lag pa g-yas su gtad do //
T02TD1359E:140b-15: dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba'i po ti aa zhes brjod cing g-yon par ro //
T02TD1359E:140b-16: yang aa las byung ba'i dril bu de nyid brjod cing lag pa g-yon du gtad de /
T02TD1359E:140b-17: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1359E:140b-18: nam mkha' nyid la mtshan nyid med //
T02TD1359E:140b-19: nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa ste //
T02TD1359E:140b-20: kun gyi mchog ste mnyam nyid gsal //
T02TD1359E:140b-21: deng nas bsams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1359E:140b-22: chos kyi dung ni bla med pa //
T02TD1359E:140b-23: kun du gang ba byed bzhin pas ;
T02TD1359E:140b-24: / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD1359E:140b-26: sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir //
T02TD1359E:140b-27: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad la //
T02TD1359E:140b-28: ji ltar 'dul ba chos rnams kyi //
T02TD1359E:140b-29: 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gyis //
T02TD1359E:140b-30: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin bdag / yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs par //
T02TD1359E:140b-31: ngal med dmigs pa rnams dang bral //
T02TD1359E:140b-32: sems can don rnams di ring gyis //
T02TD1359E:140b-34: des kyang phyag byas te brjod pa /
T02TD1359E:140b-35: mnga' ba dag gsung ba de ltar bgyi //
T02TD1359E:140b-36: zhes pa 'di ni rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:140b-37: de nas aom hr'am hr'im hr'im hru hrl'im hr:sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:140b-39: aom a'a: hum ho ham ksha:/
T02TD1359E:140b-41: de ltar phreng ba'i sngags la sogs pa rnams lan gsum brjod de sbyin pa ni /
T02TD1359E:140b-42: bcom ldan bdag gi sbyin byas pa //
T02TD1359E:140b-43: 'di la nye bar gnas par gyis //
T02TD1359E:140b-46: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das blangs pas //
T02TD1359E:140b-47: 'di la nye bar gnas par gyis //
T02TD1359E:140b-48: zhes pas blangs te 'di ni sngags kyi rjes su gnang ba'o //
T02TD1359E:140b-49: de nas gser ram dngul las byas pa'i snod du mar dang sbrang rtsi'i mig sman gser las byas pa'i thur mas blangs te /
T02TD1359E:140b-50: slob ma'i mig tu pra yig bsams la /
T02TD1359E:140b-51: aom badzra ne tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hri:/
T02TD1359E:140b-52: zhes brjod cing bsku bar bya zhing /
T02TD1359E:140b-53: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD1359E:141a-0: @141a * // 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar //
T02TD1359E:141a-1: bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD1359E:141a-2: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD1359E:141a-3: zhes pa 'di ni mig sman gyi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:141a-4: de nas me long mngon par blangs te aa: mngon par bzlas zhing slob ma la bstan cing brjod la /
T02TD1359E:141a-5: chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par //
T02TD1359E:141a-6: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD1359E:141a-7: gzung bya med cing brjod bya med //
T02TD1359E:141a-8: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02TD1359E:141a-9: dus 'khor me long gnas mtshungs par //
T02TD1359E:141a-10: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD1359E:141a-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo ste //
T02TD1359E:141a-12: bu khyod snying la yang dag gnas //
T02TD1359E:141a-13: khyod la 'dren pa'i spyan ldan pas //
T02TD1359E:141a-14: ngo bo med cing gnas med pa //
T02TD1359E:141a-15: 'di ltar chos rnams shes kyis la //
T02TD1359E:141a-16: sems can don ni mnyam med gyis [*kyis] //
T02TD1359E:141a-17: zhes pa ni me long gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:141a-18: de nas ho yig las byung ba'i gzhu ho zhes pas byin pa yang /
T02TD1359E:141a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'an aa nu r'a g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:141a-21: slob mas kyang mda' bkang bzhin pas /
T02TD1359E:141a-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'an aa nu r'a ga y'a mi /
T02TD1359E:141a-24: blos bgegs la 'bigs par bsam zhing phyogs mtshams steng 'og rnams su'o //
T02TD1359E:141a-25: 'di ni mda' gzhu'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:141a-26: de nas slob ma la kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes brjod de /
T02TD1359E:141a-27: rdo rje dang dril bu byin la mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya /
T02TD1359E:141a-28: rdo rje'i rigs su nges par srog gcod pa dang ral gri mi bden pa yi ngag brjod bya ba dang //
T02TD1359E:141a-29: rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog /
T02TD1359E:141a-30: 'khor lor chang dang mar me sangs rgyas rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bsten par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:141a-31: gri gug tu ni gdol pa mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha' yi padma smad mi bya //
T02TD1359E:141a-32: sems can rnams kyi don du nor dang lus bcas sbyin bya 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min //
T02TD1359E:141a-33: rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal pa grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges //
T02TD1359E:141a-34: chu yi sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal ba rnams te dar dpyangs nus ma rnams //
T02TD1359E:141a-35: rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gi byams pa sogs su sbyong //
T02TD1359E:141b-0: rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i @141b 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa //
T02TD1359E:141b-1: de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin /
T02TD1359E:141b-2: de nas ras kyi yol ba la sogs pas dben par byas pa'i gnas su gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa dam tshig dang ldan pa lo bcu gcig nas nyi shu'i bar ram de med na gzhan phyag rgya ma bum pa'i dbang la sogs pa'i don du phul la thal mo sbyar te bla ma dus kyi 'khor lor dmigs la /
T02TD1359E:141b-3: sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa yi //
T02TD1359E:141b-5: mchog tu mi 'gyur bdes gang ba //
T02TD1359E:141b-6: ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1359E:141b-7: stong dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i //
T02TD1359E:141b-8: byang chub sems gang mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD1359E:141b-9: mgon po bdag la dbang de yis //
T02TD1359E:141b-10: da lta nyid du bka' drin mdzod //
T02TD1359E:141b-11: bu dang chung ma sogs bcas pas //
T02TD1359E:141b-12: thams cad du ni khyod kyi 'bangs //
T02TD1359E:141b-13: ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
T02TD1359E:141b-14: bdag la skyabs ni gzhan ma mchis //
T02TD1359E:141b-15: zhes pa dang bcas pas gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD1359E:141b-16: de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02TD1359E:141b-17: slob ma sku rdo rje'i gzugs dang /
T02TD1359E:141b-18: rig ma tha mal gyi rang bzhin dag pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs kyis sgeg pa dang chags pa'i lta bas nu ma la reg tu gzhug pa'o //
T02TD1359E:141b-19: 'di ni lus rnam par dag pa bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:141b-20: de nas de ltar nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02TD1359E:141b-21: de la gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD1359E:141b-22: slob mas phul ba stong pa'i ngang las lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed la rdo rje dang padma byin gyis brlab pa sngon du song bas snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
T02TD1359E:141b-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1359E:141b-24: zhes brjod la sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis sgrol ma la sogs pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag nyid la zhugs pas chags pa chen pos zhu nas aa ba dh'u t'i nas song ste /
T02TD1359E:141b-25: rdo rje nor bur lhan cig skyes pa brtan par byas pa padma nas byung ste /
T02TD1359E:141b-26: mthe bong dang dang mthe chung dag gis bzung ste /
T02TD1359E:141b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu ba dang /
T02TD1359E:141b-28: bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems tha mi dad par go bar byas la /
T02TD1359E:141b-29: slob ma gsung rdo rje'i khar dbab pa ni /
T02TD1359E:141b-31: sngon gyi sangs rgyas sras rnams la //
T02TD1359E:141b-32: rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang bskur ltar //
T02TD1359E:142a-2: de ltar bu rnams khrus gsol cig / ces pa dang /
T02TD1359E:142a-3: nga rgyal gyi sngags brjod pas so //
T02TD1359E:142a-4: slob ma des rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshogs kyi blos kye ma bde ba chen po'i zhes brjod cing btung ngo //
T02TD1359E:142a-5: shes rab kyis kyang na bza' dang bral bar langs te rang gi padma'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig le dang me tog de nyid kyi khar dbab pa'o //
T02TD1359E:142a-6: des kyang de ltar btung bar bya ste /
T02TD1359E:142a-7: shes rab dang thabs kyi kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1359E:142a-8: 'di ni ngag rnam par dag pa gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:142a-9: de nas slob mas kye bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad thob pa da ni bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes brjod pas /
T02TD1359E:142a-10: slob dpon gyis bka' bsgo ba ltar gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma la gzugs la sogs pa yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab de'i sna rtse 'jibs te /
T02TD1359E:142a-11: snyoms par zhugs la chags pa dang ldan par byas te de bsten cing /
T02TD1359E:142a-13: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten byar gsungs //
T02TD1359E:142a-14: sbyor bas 'khor lo la dbab cing //
T02TD1359E:142a-15: dam pa'i bde bas ro mnyam myong //
T02TD1359E:142a-16: rdo rje la gnas byang chub sems //
T02TD1359E:142a-17: nor bu'i mthar ni blta bar bya //
T02TD1359E:142a-19: las kyi phyag rgya rab 'dus dang //
T02TD1359E:142a-20: ye shes phyag rgya rjes chags pas //
T02TD1359E:142a-21: byang chub sems brtan brtul zhugs kyis //
T02TD1359E:142a-22: bde ba chen por bsrung ba ni //
T02TD1359E:142a-23: bha gar mtshan ma rab gnas te //
T02TD1359E:142a-24: byang chub sems ni mi 'dzag pas //
T02TD1359E:142a-25: srid pa gsum po ma lus pa //
T02TD1359E:142a-26: sangs rgyas skur ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1359E:142a-28: shes rab mas kyang gur gum la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos lus byugs te /
T02TD1359E:142a-29: slob ma la chu skyes bstan zhing /
T02TD1359E:142a-31: bde ba dang bcas ma lus pa //
T02TD1359E:142a-32: gang gis cho ga bzhin bsten na /
T02TD1359E:142a-33: de yi mdun du bdag gnas pas //
T02TD1359E:142a-35: sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs phyir //
T02TD1359E:142a-36: bdag ni bde chen rgyal po ste //
T02TD1359E:142a-37: 'di ni rgyun du gnas pa'i phyir //
T02TD1359E:142a-38: thar pa'i bsnyen pas mnyes par gyis //
T02TD1359E:142a-39: slob ma de nyid kyang lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02TD1359E:142a-41: zhes pa rnams dpral ba dang /
T02TD1359E:142b-0: gtsug tor rnams su bkod @142b la ;
T02TD1359E:142b-1: rigs lnga'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid kyi gzugs su gnas la a'a: h'um dag las byung ba'i padma rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02TD1359E:142b-2: h'um a'a: las rdo rje padma 'dab ma brgyad kyis mtshan par dmigs la /
T02TD1359E:142b-3: g-yon pa'i g-yon gyi rtsa mdzub mo'i rtse mo la hri dmar po bsams la /
T02TD1359E:142b-5: lce'i sh'i zhes brjod pas so //
T02TD1359E:142b-6: de nas aom sh'i sh'i sh'i ha ha h'a sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:142b-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sa bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1359E:142b-9: zhes pa h'um phat dang ldan pa brjod cing /
T02TD1359E:142b-10: bla ma'i gdams ngag las dga' ba'i dbye bas go bar byas la /
T02TD1359E:142b-11: sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas lus byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1359E:142b-12: bla mas kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa grangs med pa spyan drangs te /
T02TD1359E:142b-13: ro gcig tu gyur pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:142b-15: sku gsung thugs dang chags pa rnams //
T02TD1359E:142b-16: dpral ba la sogs rnams su dgod //
T02TD1359E:142b-17: sv'a h'a gsang ba gtsug tor du //
T02TD1359E:142b-18: de nas padma rnam sbyang bya //
T02TD1359E:142b-20: h'um las rdo rje dang ldan pa //
T02TD1359E:142b-21: de ltar rdo rje dang bcas pa //
T02TD1359E:142b-22: shes rab thabs kyi rgyud nyid do //
T02TD1359E:142b-23: h'um las bdag gi rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1359E:142b-24: rtse lnga pa ru bsam par bya //
T02TD1359E:142b-26: aa yig las ni rab tu brtag / de ltar pad bcas rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1359E:142b-27: padma la ni gzhag par bya ;
T02TD1359E:142b-28: / rnal 'byor pa de h'um phat brjod //
T02TD1359E:142b-29: mngal du rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyu //
T02TD1359E:142b-30: bha gar lingga rab gnas pa //
T02TD1359E:142b-31: byang chub sems ni spro mi bya //
T02TD1359E:142b-32: khams gsum po ni ma lus pa //
T02TD1359E:142b-33: sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1359E:142b-34: zhes pa'i don go bar bya zhing ji ltar rigs par bzung ste /
T02TD1359E:142b-35: dkyil 'khor gyis btang bas padma nas lca yis blangs la de kho na'i blos dam tshig gi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:142b-36: 'di ni yid rnam par dag pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:142b-37: de nas tshig dbang rin po che sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i don gyis khyad par gyi dga' ba'i mtha' ste /
T02TD1359E:142b-38: byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas thig le gsum gyi mthar rab tu skyes pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin de kho na chos thams cad bsam du med pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rang bzhin la dbang bzhi par brjod do zhes pas so //
T02TD1359E:142b-39: de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ste gshegs su gsol la slob ma la sdom pa sbyin ba ni /
T02TD1359E:143a-0: @143a * // nga yis bstan pa'i kun rdzob bye brag tu dga' ba'i mtha' lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig gang thig le gsum gyi mtha' de don dam pa ma yin te /
T02TD1359E:143a-1: don dam pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bde ba mi 'dzag pa ste /
T02TD1359E:143a-2: de bas na khyod kyis srungs shig / de bzhin du dang po'i sangs rgyas su bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1359E:143a-3: las kyi phyag rgya rab 'dus dang //
T02TD1359E:143a-4: ye shes phyag rgya rjes chags pas //
T02TD1359E:143a-5: byang chub sems brtan brtul zhugs kyis //
T02TD1359E:143a-6: bde ba chen por bsrung ba ni //
T02TD1359E:143a-7: bha gar mtshan ma rab gnas te //
T02TD1359E:143a-8: byang chub sems ni mi 'dzag pas //
T02TD1359E:143a-9: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD1359E:143a-10: 'di las dam pa'i ye shes med //
T02TD1359E:143a-11: khams gsum dbang phyug dam pa ste //
T02TD1359E:143a-12: stong dang snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02TD1359E:143a-13: rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub byed //
T02TD1359E:143a-14: skyob pa kun gyi sdom pa ni //
T02TD1359E:143a-15: gang tshe nga yi bu skyong na //
T02TD1359E:143a-16: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1359E:143a-17: de yis byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1359E:143a-18: gal te chags pa'i dbang gyur bdag / khyab bdag sngon du gzung ba yi //
T02TD1359E:143a-19: sdom pa skyong bar mi byed na //
T02TD1359E:143a-21: gang tshe sems dman skye gnas su //
T02TD1359E:143a-22: byang chub sems 'dzag gyur pa na //
T02TD1359E:143a-23: phyag rgya'i padma'i phyi rol nas //
T02TD1359E:143a-24: rang lces blang bar shes par bya //
T02TD1359E:143a-26: 'di ni ye shes dag pa dbang bzhi pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:143a-27: de nas slob ma'i lag par shes rab kyi lag pa gtad la /
T02TD1359E:143a-28: de nas bdag nyid kyi lag pa g-yon pas bzung la g-yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa slob ma'i mgo la gzhag ste gtad la /
T02TD1359E:143a-29: 'di'i dbang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin pas zhes de ltar byas la /
T02TD1359E:143a-30: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min //
T02TD1359E:143a-32: de phyir 'di dang sbyor ba las //
T02TD1359E:143a-33: nam yang 'bral bar ma byed cig /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1359E:143a-34: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02TD1359E:143a-36: dngos grub dam pa med par 'gyur /
T02TD1359E:143a-37: zhes brjod la rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:143a-38: 'di ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD1359E:143a-39: de nas dbang thams cad thob pa dang thos pa dang /
T02TD1359E:143b-0: bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i rgyud kyi don thams cad bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi lam dpal gyi bla ma khyod kyi bka' drin gyis deng @143b ngas shes pas ded [*deng?] nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khyod spangs nas bla ma gzhan la gus par mi bya'o //
T02TD1359E:143b-2: de nas bla ma la gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02TD1359E:143b-3: sngon gyi tshigs su bcad pas so //
T02TD1359E:143b-4: de nas lhag pa'i bdag po'i don du cho ga 'di lta ste /
T02TD1359E:143b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi rol du sa gzhi mnyam pa'i cha la khru bzhi'i bar la ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pas byugs pa tshon lnga'i rab byas te /
T02TD1359E:143b-6: de'i dbus su khru do pa'i gdan gyi steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la de'i steng du slob dpon dge slong bzhag la gzugs bzang ba rgyan dang ldan pa bu ma skyes pa'i bu mo brgyad /
T02TD1359E:143b-7: gzhon nu ma gnyis rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang bcas pas cod pan dang dar dbyangs dang /
T02TD1359E:143b-8: phyag rgya dang bcas pas bcings la khrus bya'o //
T02TD1359E:143b-9: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sdigs mdzub dang chos gos mthong bas gdug pa de rnams 'og tu 'gro ba'o zhes so //
T02TD1359E:143b-10: de ltar re kh'a lnga dang ldan pa'i dbus su padma dang bral ba'i gdan la slob dpon dge tshul bzhag pa la phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i dar dbyangs byin la /
T02TD1359E:143b-11: bu mo bzhi dang gzhon nu ma gnyis kyis khrus bya'o //
T02TD1359E:143b-12: de ltar re kh'a gsum dang ldan pa'i dbus su tha mal gyi gdan la slob dpon khyim pa bzhag la phyag rgya byin te /
T02TD1359E:143b-13: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gcig pus gzhon nu ma gcig gis khrus bya'o //
T02TD1359E:143b-14: 'di ni mchog dang bar ma dang tha ma'i slob dpon gyi dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1359E:143b-15: de nas dbang gong ma'i don du slob mas slob dpon la phyag rgya bcu gtad de /
T02TD1359E:143b-16: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1359E:143b-17: tsha mo dang ni bu mo dang //
T02TD1359E:143b-18: sring mo skyed byed ma de bzhin //
T02TD1359E:143b-19: chung ma'i ma ste sgyug mo nyid //
T02TD1359E:143b-20: de bzhin du ni zhang ne mo //
T02TD1359E:143b-21: pha yi de bzhin spun chung ma //
T02TD1359E:143b-22: skyed byed kyi ni sring mo dang //
T02TD1359E:143b-23: rang gi ma yi sbun nyid dang //
T02TD1359E:143b-24: rang gi chung ma mchog gzugs can //
T02TD1359E:143b-25: sgrol ma la sogs chos khams mthar //
T02TD1359E:143b-26: rig ma bcu rnams rang rigs skyes //
T02TD1359E:143b-27: thar pa 'dod pa'i khyim pa yis //
T02TD1359E:143b-28: dbang gi dus su rab sbyin bya //
T02TD1359E:143b-29: gang zhig rigs ni 'di bsrungs pas //
T02TD1359E:143b-30: bla mar rig ma mi dbul na //
T02TD1359E:143b-31: de la dbang ni sbyin mi bya //
T02TD1359E:143b-32: gzhan du na ni khyim nas min //
T02TD1359E:143b-33: dkyil 'khor rnams su dbang bskur ba'i //
T02TD1359E:143b-34: gzhan yang dmangs rigs skyes tshogs rnams //
T02TD1359E:144a-2: bla mas sbyin no mi bdag kye //
T02TD1359E:144a-3: rlung sogs rim pas dmangs rigs dang //
T02TD1359E:144a-4: rgyal rigs bram ze de bzhin du //
T02TD1359E:144a-5: rje'u rigs g-yung mo nya ma dang //
T02TD1359E:144a-6: gar mtshos ma de bzhin du //
T02TD1359E:144a-7: ko lpags mkhan dang gtum mo dang //
T02TD1359E:144a-8: chos khams mthar de bcu po rnams ;
T02TD1359E:144a-9: / rig ma chen mor yang dag bshad //
T02TD1359E:144a-10: zos dang grol 'bras rab tu ster //
T02TD1359E:144a-11: zhes pas 'di thams cad sngon du song ba ltar dmangs rigs la sogs pa phyag rgya bcus dge slong la'o //
T02TD1359E:144a-12: de rnams kyi nang nas drug gis dge tshul gyi'o //
T02TD1359E:144a-13: rang gi chung ma gcig pus khyim pa la'o //
T02TD1359E:144a-14: 'di ni shes rab kyi ye shes kyi chos kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1359E:144a-15: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma ltar ro //
T02TD1359E:144a-16: chu la sogs pa'i dbang bdun gyis sa bdun du lung bstan pa dge bsnyen no //
T02TD1359E:144a-17: bum pas brgyad pa mi g-yo bar lung bstan pa dge tshul gzhon nu'i zhes pas so //
T02TD1359E:144a-18: gsang bas legs pa'i blo gros su lung bstan pa dge slong sangs rgyas kyi sras rgyal tshab bo //
T02TD1359E:144a-19: shes rab ye shes kyis chos kyi sprin du lung bstan pa gnas brtan te sangs rgyas gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1359E:144a-20: de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bya ba'i don du gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs dang /
T02TD1359E:144a-23: cod pan rnams ni bum pa dang /
T02TD1359E:144a-25: shes rab ye shes te gong ma'i gong ma'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:144a-26: de nas shar gyi sgo ru slob ma'i steng du gdugs bzung la g-yas su bskor ba byed bzhin pas //
T02TD1359E:144a-27: thal mo sbyar byas dkyil 'khor bskor //
T02TD1359E:144a-28: gdugs dang bcas pas mchod pa la //
T02TD1359E:144a-29: slob ma 'di ni khyod la gtad //
T02TD1359E:144a-30: rgyud kyi 'dzin pa po ru mdzod ;
T02TD1359E:144a-31: / ces dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD1359E:144a-32: gdugs gzhan du bzhag la slob ma'i yid la 'dod pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1359E:144a-34: sngags dang rgyud kyi 'dzin pa khyod //
T02TD1359E:144a-35: sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems //
T02TD1359E:144a-36: lha rnams kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur //
T02TD1359E:144a-37: sems can kun la brtse ba yis //
T02TD1359E:144a-38: chog bzhin dkyil 'khor khyod nyid kyis //
T02TD1359E:144a-39: shin tu rtsol bas bri bar bya //
T02TD1359E:144a-40: sgrub pa po yi rgyud la zhugs //
T02TD1359E:144a-41: gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1359E:144a-42: mchog tu lta zhing zhugs pa yis //
T02TD1359E:144a-43: de ring khyod kyi sdig pa rnams //
T02TD1359E:144b-0: ma lus @144b grol nas yang dag gnas //
T02TD1359E:144b-1: gzhan yang khyod la 'pho ba med //
T02TD1359E:144b-2: bde chen theg pa 'di nyid kyis //
T02TD1359E:144b-3: 'khor ba shin tu dag byas nas //
T02TD1359E:144b-4: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las log / tshe ldan de ring dbang nyid kyis //
T02TD1359E:144b-5: sangs rgyas kun dang rdo rjer bcas //
T02TD1359E:144b-6: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid kyis //
T02TD1359E:144b-7: rje bor khyod nyid nges pa'o //
T02TD1359E:144b-8: 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu //
T02TD1359E:144b-9: khams gsum na ni yod pa min //
T02TD1359E:144b-10: de phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba //
T02TD1359E:144b-11: khyod kyis nam yang bya ba min //
T02TD1359E:144b-12: chags pa kun la nye bar spyod //
T02TD1359E:144b-13: bde ba nam yang 'jigs byed ma //
T02TD1359E:144b-14: sha lnga bdud rtsi dang bcas spyod //
T02TD1359E:144b-15: dam tshig nam yang de bzhin gsungs //
T02TD1359E:144b-16: srog gcod pa ni nam yang min //
T02TD1359E:144b-17: dpal gyi rin chen spang mi bya //
T02TD1359E:144b-18: sdom pa spang bar mi bya zhing //
T02TD1359E:144b-19: khyod kyis slob dpon mi spong ngo //
T02TD1359E:144b-20: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ltar //
T02TD1359E:144b-21: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
T02TD1359E:144b-22: shes rab thabs kyi sems ldan pas //
T02TD1359E:144b-23: khyod la sdig med 'jigs mi dgos //
T02TD1359E:144b-24: zhes pa'i chos nyid 'dis cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur nas /
T02TD1359E:144b-25: bu gcig pa la brtse ba ltar /
T02TD1359E:144b-26: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brtse ba'i sems kyis dge bar dgongs pa 'di ni dbugs dbyung ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:144b-27: de ltar slob ma dbang thob cing dbugs phyung bas 'di ltar bya ste /
T02TD1359E:144b-28: de ring bdag skyes 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD1359E:144b-29: bdag ni 'bras bu dang bcas srog / de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD1359E:144b-30: de ring sangs rgyas sras su gyur //
T02TD1359E:144b-43: yid du 'ong ba'i chung ma dang /
T02TD1359E:144b-45: bu mo la sogs pa ji ltar 'byor pa bla ma la gus pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:144b-46: de nas nyin mo'i dus su gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma bcu la'o ma la sogs pa mngar ba'i ston mo bya'o //
T02TD1359E:144b-47: chu tshod bdun song ba dang /
T02TD1359E:144b-48: dge slong dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la nya sha la sogs pa spangs pa'i mngar bas mnyes par byas te /
T02TD1359E:144b-49: yon phul / lha khang du gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1359E:145a-0: bug pa med pa bar du gcod pa med pa 'du 'dzi me dpa'i gnas su mtshan mo nyi ma rgas pa'i dus su rigs sum cu so drug gi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams gzhan gyis ma @145a * //
T02TD1359E:145a-1: tshor bar zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rim pas gnas pa ni /
T02TD1359E:145a-2: dbus su ba lang dang stag gi pags pa'i gdan la shes rab dang bcas pa'i gtso bo ste /
T02TD1359E:145a-3: slob dpon sdod cing mi'i pags pa'i snod do //
T02TD1359E:145a-4: de'i g-yas phyogs su mi'i pags pa'i steng du g-yung mo'o //
T02TD1359E:145a-8: glang po che'i pags pa'i stan rnams la dmangs rigs ma dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-9: rgyal rigs mo dang bram ze mo dang rje rigs ma rnams so //
T02TD1359E:145a-10: mtshams rnams kyi byang shar nas dri chu dang dri chen dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-12: rkang rnams kyi snod rnams so //
T02TD1359E:145a-13: de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor pa'i phyogs rnams su lug dang nags kyi khyi dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-14: rnga mo dang 'dam seng gi pags pa rnams la 'khar ba mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-15: aum bi'i steng du gar byed ma dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-17: khron pa byed ma rnams so //
T02TD1359E:145a-18: mtshams rnams la ra dang ri dags dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-19: bong bu dang phag pa'i pags pa'i stan rnams la thag ma dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-21: gser mgar ma dang phreng ba ma rnams so //
T02TD1359E:145a-22: de nas gsum pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnas la phyogs dang mtshams rnams la chu srin ku mbhi ra dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-24: ka ka ri'i phung po dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-29: dung gi gdan rnams la shan pa ma dang bum pa byed ma dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-36: de nas bzhi pha'i yongs su bskor ba'i phyogs su bse dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-39: don rnams kyi pags pa la lcags mgar ma dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-43: mtshams rnams su me'i mtshams nas 'bri dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-46: byi la'i pags pa rnams la /
T02TD1359E:145a-51: yongs su bskor ba lnga pa la go dh'a ba dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-53: s'a la dzi ta ka dang /
T02TD1359E:145a-59: mtshams kyi me mtshams nas ri bong dang /
T02TD1359E:145b-0: ai @145b shu ka pa shu dang /
T02TD1359E:145b-1: sbal pa rnams la ko skya ma dang /
T02TD1359E:145b-2: mthu ma dang mi rgod ma dang /
T02TD1359E:145b-4: pags pa 'di rnams med na shar dang mer khyi'i pags pa'o //
T02TD1359E:145b-5: lho dang bden bral du rta'i pags pa'o //
T02TD1359E:145b-6: nub dang rlung du glang po che'i pags pa'o //
T02TD1359E:145b-7: byang dang dbang ldan du ba lang gi pags pa'o //
T02TD1359E:145b-9: rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams ma lus pa gos dang bral ba skra grol ba phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa de rnams kyi g-yas rnams su dpa' bo yang de rnams dang mnyam pa /
T02TD1359E:145b-10: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa de rnams la pags pa'i gdan sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:145b-11: de rnams btung ba'i snod ni shar dang mer nya phyis so //
T02TD1359E:145b-12: lho dang lho nub tu na ri ke la'i snod do //
T02TD1359E:145b-13: nub dang rlung du kham phor ro //
T02TD1359E:145b-14: byang dang dbang ldan du mi'i thod pa'o //
T02TD1359E:145b-15: dbus su shing gi por pa rnams so //
T02TD1359E:145b-16: de nas dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1359E:145b-17: gdan gyi srog chags sum cu so drug gi stobs rnams chu la spyod pa'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1359E:145b-47: mig sngon tsa ko ra dang /
T02TD1359E:145b-49: pags pa'i bya chen po dang /
T02TD1359E:145b-55: aam pa ri ka rnams kyi stobs te /
T02TD1359E:145b-56: 'di rnams ni mkha' la spyod pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas sum cu so drug go //
T02TD1359E:145b-80: rnag rnams kha dog sna tshogs dang dri sna tshogs dang /
T02TD1359E:146a-0: 'di rnams ni sems can rnams kyi @146a * //
T02TD1359E:146a-17: lha bshos rnams snod du bzhag ste /
T02TD1359E:146a-18: phyogs mtshams brgyad du gzhag go //
T02TD1359E:146a-19: de nas slob dpon gyis srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa sngon du song bas stong pa nyid kyi rjes la bdag nyid kyis bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo la yon chab sngon du song bas /
T02TD1359E:146a-20: thugs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146a-21: de rnams kyang lha'i gzugs su bsgoms la de nas slob dpon gyis sngon du song ba'i dam tshig gi rdzas dang /
T02TD1359E:146a-22: stobs dang myos byed dang zan la sogs pa sngon du bzhag la gtor ma sbyang ngo //
T02TD1359E:146a-23: yang na sbyang lugs gzhan ni aom badzra kro dhe shva ri sarba dra by'a ni bi sho dha ya h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:146a-24: ces pas bdud rtsi lnga myos byed kyis bzhu bar bya ste bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146a-25: de nas srin lag gis blangs nas gru gsum byas pa'i dbus su mandala zlum po byas la de la ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ngo //
T02TD1359E:146a-26: de nas srin lag gis blangs la sngon du song ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146a-27: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD1359E:146a-28: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par byas nas gshegs su gsol bar byas te //
T02TD1359E:146a-29: de nas zhing skyong rnams la sngon du song ba'i sngags kyis gtor ma byin la /
T02TD1359E:146a-30: de nas aom h'a ri ti pi na di kam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:146a-31: aom d'u ti ke aa gra gr'a sa ma pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:146a-32: zhes pas 'phrog ma dang pho nya dag la chang zan dang phud yi ge gsum mngon par bsngags te sa la bzhag la zas ma zos pa dang sbyin no //
T02TD1359E:146a-33: de nas yon bdag gis mandala byas la ci bde bar gsol bar zhu zhes pa'o //
T02TD1359E:146a-34: de nas las kyi rdo rjes bla ma la gus pas bag yod pas dam tshig gi rdzas de dang de rnams gus pa dang bcas pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146a-35: myos byed kyi snod padma'i phyag gis drang bar bya zhing lan pas kyang padma'i lag kor gyis so //
T02TD1359E:146a-36: slob dpon la thams cad nyis 'gyur du drang bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146a-37: de rnams kyis myos byed kyi phud dang po slob dpon la phul te phyag byas la btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146b-0: gnang ba ma byin gyi @146b bar du myos byed sa la mi gzhag cing sa la gzhag na gcig la gcig padma'i phyag gis drang zhing blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146b-1: de ltar stobs dang myos byed la sogs pa ldag pa dang btung ba dang bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams 'dren pa'i dus su de dag gis brjod pa /
T02TD1359E:146b-2: chos rnams rang bzhin rnam par dag /'di la the tshom ma byed par //
T02TD1359E:146b-3: bram ze khyi dang gdol pa rnams //
T02TD1359E:146b-4: rang bzhin gcig tu za bar gyis //
T02TD1359E:146b-5: bde gshegs chos rnams zag pa med //
T02TD1359E:146b-6: nam mkha' dang mtshungs dri ma med //
T02TD1359E:146b-7: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams dang bral //
T02TD1359E:146b-10: 'khor lo gtso bos ma gnang bas //
T02TD1359E:146b-11: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ba min //
T02TD1359E:146b-12: lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
T02TD1359E:146b-13: bya ba thams cad dal gyis bya //
T02TD1359E:146b-14: gzhan du na rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1359E:146b-15: 'gro bar 'dod na 'khor lo'i gtso bo la sogs pa la phyag byas te //
T02TD1359E:146b-17: 'jug pa'i dus su phyag byas la'o //
T02TD1359E:146b-18: de ltar mnyam par gzhag pas longs spyad do //
T02TD1359E:146b-19: stobs dang myos byed la sogs pas shes pas bteg na bla ma las rjes gnang thob pa dang yid du 'ong ba'i rdo rje'i glu cung zad smad la blang ba ni lha de dang de'i phyag rgya dang gar dang bcas pas so //
T02TD1359E:146b-20: de nas stobs dang myos byed la sogs pa bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa byas pa dang so so'i gnas na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
T02TD1359E:146b-21: zur gyi mig gis bsdus pa'i lta bas blta bar bya zhing mtho la mkhregs pa'i nu ma dang padma reg cing mchu gzhib cing 'khrud pa la sogs pa'i ka ra na'i bye brag bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146b-22: 'dir rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi tha dad kyi ngo tsha dang rigs dang /
T02TD1359E:146b-23: rigs min la sogs pa'i rnam par rtogs pa spangs te /
T02TD1359E:146b-24: so so'i gnas na gnas pa'i sring mo la sogs pa sna dang /
T02TD1359E:146b-25: rna ba dang mchu la sogs pa chad pa dang /
T02TD1359E:146b-26: gzugs dan pa la sogs pa de ru 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis spang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1359E:146b-27: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //
T02TD1359E:146b-28: de yang lang tsho ma gang zhig autpala'i spyan dang ldan pas slob dpon dang dpa' bo rnams dang bcas pa'i rdo rje la mchod par byed na /
T02TD1359E:146b-29: de'i bsod nams ni sa gzhi dang glang po che dang /
T02TD1359E:146b-31: phu mo la sogs pa dpag tu med pa phul ba bas kyang bsod nams che'o //
T02TD1359E:147a-1: ma rnams kyi phyag dang mtshan ma dang //
T02TD1359E:147a-2: rigs kyi dbye ba la sogs pa gzhung ches kyis dogs pas ma bris so //
T02TD1359E:147a-3: de nas stobs dang myos byed la sogs pa la longs spyod la de ltar thams cad bya ste /
T02TD1359E:147a-6: 'thungs pa'i lhag ma sleb dpon gyis sdud du bcug la /
T02TD1359E:147a-7: mdun du bzhag pa la slar yang myos byed la sogs pa blugs te /
T02TD1359E:147a-8: sngags gsum gyis mngon par byin gyis brlabs pa'i chang gi kha phru btab la /
T02TD1359E:147a-9: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD1359E:147a-10: au tstshi shta ba l'i autstshi shta bhaksha ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:147a-11: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lhag ma'i gtor ma la ste /
T02TD1359E:147a-12: mar me dang bcas pa phyi log su gtong du bzhug go //
T02TD1359E:147a-15: rna rgyan la sogs pa dri zhim po dang bcas pa'i so rtsi la sogs pa gtso bo dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo la sogs pa rnams la 'bul lo //
T02TD1359E:147a-16: de nas mandala byas te brjod pa /
T02TD1359E:147a-17: bsod nams 'di yis sems can grangs med khams gsum la gnas rnams kyis bla na med pa thob par shog / ces pas yon gyi bdag pos smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:147a-18: de nas lhag ma lus pa dong du sba bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:147a-19: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor los bdag rgyal po'am gzhan gyis bya ba'o //
T02TD1359E:147a-20: de las gzhan pa ni cho ga pa'i bye brag ji ltar rnyed pa'i tha ma la ma'i bud med dam skyes pa rnams las lnga'am bcu gsum mam /
T02TD1359E:147a-23: yongs su rdzogs pa la snyan gsan phab ste /
T02TD1359E:147a-24: ji lhar rnyed pa'i gdan la sogs pa de ltar thams cad bya'o //
T02TD1359E:147a-25: de nas dpa' bo'i ston mo ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor med na dbus ba lang gi lci bas gru bzhi pa byas te /
T02TD1359E:147a-26: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs pa la sogs pa /
T02TD1359E:147a-27: slob dpon gyis snga ma ltar byas la /
T02TD1359E:147a-28: de yang tshogs kyi gtso bo kha shar du phyogs pa'o //
T02TD1359E:147a-29: de'i g-yon du phyag rgya gcig yon bdag gis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:147a-30: gzhan du na phyag rgya dang bral ba'i chang gi btung ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1359E:147a-31: de'i g-yas phyogs su slob dpon dge slong rnams ni gral shar du phyogs pas so //
T02TD1359E:147a-32: bden bral nas slob dpon dge tshul rnams byang du phyogs pas so //
T02TD1359E:147a-33: dbang ldan nas slob dpon khyim pa rnams kha lho ru phyogs pas so //
T02TD1359E:147b-0: de ltar dge slong ma dang dge tshul @147b ma dang /
T02TD1359E:147b-1: dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang ngo //
T02TD1359E:147b-2: tshogs kyi gtso mo'i g-yon du thabs cig yon bdag gis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:147b-3: gzhan du na thabs dang bral ba'i stobs kyis bza' ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1359E:147b-4: lhag ma snga ma dang mtshungs so //
T02TD1359E:147b-5: 'di ni dpa' bo'i ston mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:147b-6: de nas gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram bris sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du song bas lugs ma la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:147b-7: stong ba'i dang las sa bon la sogs pa las yongs su rdzogs pa'am /
T02TD1359E:147b-8: skad cig gis dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs thugs kar sa bon dang bcas pa bsams la /
T02TD1359E:147b-9: na bza' gsar ba dmar po la sogs pa bskon pa dang /
T02TD1359E:147b-10: de nas yon bdag me tog dang dang bcas pa de nyid gzugs brnyan me tog dang bcas par dmigs te /
T02TD1359E:147b-11: yon bdag lugs ma sogs pa dang bcas pas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin du rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ste /
T02TD1359E:147b-12: slob dpon gyis kyang lugs ma la sogs pa'i lhag pa'i lha'i mtshan ma 'am de'i rigs kyi mtshan ma la de'i me tog gi phreng ba 'bul du gzhug go //
T02TD1359E:147b-13: yang na me tog dor ba sngangs te /
T02TD1359E:147b-14: lugs ma la sogs pa dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:147b-15: de yang dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi phyogs ma byang shar mtshams su khrus kyi gdan gyi snam bu chu dang zheng du ji ltar 'tsham par bya ba'am /
T02TD1359E:147b-16: ji lta ba bzhin dus gzhi la byugs pa la sogs byas pa la bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i ba'i rnam lngas byugs te /
T02TD1359E:147b-17: phyogs mtshams la bum pa brgyad bkod pa dang /
T02TD1359E:147b-18: me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1359E:147b-25: sgra la sogs pa ji ltar nus pa yid du 'ong bar byas la /
T02TD1359E:147b-26: dge ba'i tshes la sogs pa la slob dpon rgyan thams cad btags te /
T02TD1359E:147b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' rig ma dang bcas pa'i nga rgyal gyis /
T02TD1359E:147b-28: stegs bu'i dbus su thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyi gru bzhi pa /
T02TD1359E:147b-29: rta babs dang bral ba'i nub kyi sgo dang ldan pa sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa phyogs dang mtshams rnams la don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i mtshan rnams rdul tshon gyis bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148a-1: bul padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris pa la /
T02TD1359E:148a-2: lugs ma la sogs pa bskyod par nus pa rnams shar du phyogs bas bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD1359E:148a-3: lha khang dang mchod rten du dri gtsang khang dang /
T02TD1359E:148a-4: lugs ma chen po rnams snga ma ltar dam tshig pa bskyed la dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par bsam pa ste /
T02TD1359E:148a-5: de rnams la khrus kyi sna ma bu dgos pa med pas na de ltar bye brag gnyis so //
T02TD1359E:148a-6: de yang nub mo'i dus su lugs ma la sogs pa sngon du bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD1359E:148a-7: de la bdag nyid mngon par phyogs te zhabs bsil la sogs sngon du song bas nir man tshan bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:148a-8: aom a'a: h'um ho ham ksha:/
T02TD1359E:148a-9: zhes pa'i sngags kyis grub pa'i yungs kar chang ba g-yas g-yon du gzung la so sor lan gnyis su g-yon du bskor zhing /
T02TD1359E:148a-10: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya badzra sa tva sya sarba p'a pam da ha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:148a-11: zhes pa bzlas te yungs kar me la gdegs par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148a-12: de ltar g-yas su bskor bas kyang ngo //
T02TD1359E:148a-13: de ltar chus gang ba'i kham por dang d'ur ba dang bcas pa'i ba lang gi lci bas chang bar bcangs la chang zan dang /
T02TD1359E:148a-14: gsil ya ba ras rnams te /
T02TD1359E:148a-15: 'on kyang kha 'phor la sogs pa me ru skyur bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148a-16: de nas lugs ma la sogs pa la lag pas reg la /
T02TD1359E:148a-17: gtso bo'i sngags dang bcas pas lugs ma la sogs pa la ji ltar rigs pa ltar dngos su 'am me long gi gzugs brnyan la dri ni thugs kar byug go //
T02TD1359E:148a-20: mar me bskor bzhin pas so //
T02TD1359E:148a-21: mar dang sbos dkar yi ge drug pa lan bdun bzlas te bdug par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148a-22: 'di ni nir man tsha na'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:148a-23: de nas yi ge drug pa bzlas shing d'u ra ba'i pir gyis zangs kyi snod na gnas pa'i zho dang /
T02TD1359E:148a-28: bdud rtsi lnga'i bdag nyid dang /
T02TD1359E:148a-32: ba lang gi lci ba dang /
T02TD1359E:148a-33: chu rnams kyis lugs ma la sogs pa sku khrus gsol du btub pa rnams la /
T02TD1359E:148a-35: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byug par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148a-36: bris sku dang po ti la sogs pa rnams me long gi gzugs brnyan la'o //
T02TD1359E:148a-37: de nas yi ge drug pa bzla zhing chu gtsang ma dang dri zhim bos khrus bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148a-38: de nas khar ba'i snod du 'dag chal lnga blugs pas dag par bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:148b-0: @148b aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:148b-2: me dang nyi mas smin pa'i dri'i mar gyis byugs la yang 'dag chal gyis so //
T02TD1359E:148b-3: skyur pos byugs la de ltar khrus byas te /
T02TD1359E:148b-4: khar ba'i snod kyi yung bas byugs nas yang khrus bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148b-8: gla rtsi la sogs pas mnyam par byugs te /
T02TD1359E:148b-9: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i bum pas khrus byed par bsam zhing bkra shis kyi glu dang bcas pas bum pa rnams kyi chu yis khrus bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:148b-10: sngon du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas pas so //
T02TD1359E:148b-11: de nyid la chags pa'i chu ras 'jam pos dbyi bar byas la de la ji ltar nus pa'i na bza' dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148b-12: de nas sa bon gyis ye shes sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1359E:148b-15: lha rnams mdun du spyan drangs la zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD1359E:148b-17: yon chab rnams sngon du song bas bus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs te /
T02TD1359E:148b-18: lag pa g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing g-yas pas spos snod kyis bdug cing h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i lce dang ldan pas /
T02TD1359E:148b-19: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo nyid ces pa /
T02TD1359E:148b-20: bdag ni rdo rje che ge nyid //
T02TD1359E:148b-21: ces par bsgyur bas bstod de /
T02TD1359E:148b-23: aom badzra pu na r'a ga ma na ya mu:/
T02TD1359E:148b-24: zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1359E:148b-25: khrus byas pa'i lugs ma la sogs pa rnams kyi gnas lnga rnams la dris byugs la mchod de /
T02TD1359E:148b-26: yi ge drug pa dang bcas pa'i g-yas kyi rdo rje lan gsum du reg nas lha de dang de'i bsngags bzlas te /
T02TD1359E:148b-27: de nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma dbul lo zhes pas so //
T02TD1359E:148b-28: gang zhig sems can brtan na lhag par gnas pa med kyang rab tu gnas par bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:148b-29: gsungs par 'gyur pa'i cho ga rnams nyi ma gcig la bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148b-30: yon bdag la 'byor pa yod na bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:148b-31: 'di ni lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1359E:148b-32: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi gzhi la sgo bzhi pa re kh'a lnga dang bcas pa byas la /
T02TD1359E:148b-33: dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1359E:148b-34: phyogs dang mtshams rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin mtshan ma rnams dgod do //
T02TD1359E:149a-0: de nas lugs ma la sogs pa dkyil 'khor @149a * //
T02TD1359E:149a-1: la sngon du phyogs pas zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1359E:149a-2: rgyud dang sgrub thabs la sogs par lha bskyed pa'i bye brag slob dpon gyis go bar bya ste /
T02TD1359E:149a-3: mchod rten la sogs pa stong ba'i dang las rim pas sam /
T02TD1359E:149a-4: skad cig gis dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs bsgom mo //
T02TD1359E:149a-5: po ti rnams ni stong pa'i dang las a'a: de las 'od dpag tu med pa'i rig ma dang bcas pa padma dang nyi ma'i steng du'o //
T02TD1359E:149a-6: de yang yongs su gyur pa las yi ge'i gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid 'od dpag med kyi gzugs kyi dam tshig pa du bsgom /
T02TD1359E:149a-9: dri'i gtsang khang la sogs pa rnams padma dang zla pa la gnas pa /
T02TD1359E:149a-10: aom las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad spyan ma la 'khyud pa yongs su gyur pa las lha khang la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyi dam tshig sems dpa' ru bsgom mo //
T02TD1359E:149a-11: gzhan yang stong ba'i rang bzhin du ni byas nas rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams //
T02TD1359E:149a-12: zhes pas sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i tshogs bdag nyid dus kyi 'khor lor bsgom zhing /
T02TD1359E:149a-13: lha la sogs pa rnams kyang so so'i sa bon las byung ba'i so so'i gzugs kyi rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD1359E:149a-14: zla ba dkar po la sogs pa nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ljang gu'i bar dpral ba la sogs pa'i 'khor lo nas gsang ba'i bar du bkod la aom nas ksha:'i bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:149a-16: rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te /
T02TD1359E:149a-17: zhabs bsil la sogs pas mchod la /
T02TD1359E:149a-18: dza h'um bam ho: zhes pa brjod de lcags kyu'i phyag rgyal sogs pas khro bo bzhi yis dgug pa dang /
T02TD1359E:149a-21: dbang du bya ba rnams rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD1359E:149a-22: de nas lugs ma la sogs pa rnams snying ga'i padmar nyi ma dang zla ba kha sbyar gyi nang du sa bon gyi yi ge dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:149a-23: de nas chu la sogs pa'i dbang rnams sngon du gsungs pa'i slob ma la dbang bskur ba ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02TD1359E:149a-24: yang na bsgoms pas thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:149a-25: gzhan yang dbang bskur ba spangs la thugs kang sa bon bkod pa dang /
T02TD1359E:149a-26: lnga'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs su nges par bltas la rang gi sngags sam /
T02TD1359E:149b-0: aom @149b a'a: badzra wa stra ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:149b-2: de ltar aom a'a: badzra dang por brjod cing h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:149b-3: mtha' mar sbyar pa'i sngags rnams kyis me tog dang /
T02TD1359E:149b-6: lha bshos dang rgyan la sogs ba dbul lo //
T02TD1359E:149b-7: aom a'a: sarba sho dha na h'um phat /
T02TD1359E:149b-9: 'bras bul sogs bdag par bya ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1359E:149b-11: zhes pa'i 'bras bus 'dren pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1359E:149b-12: de nas dam tshig gi rdzas byin la /
T02TD1359E:149b-14: zhes pa'i sngags kyis me long bstan no //
T02TD1359E:149b-15: de nas sbyin sreg gis mnyes par bya ba ni /
T02TD1359E:149b-16: yon bdag gi 'byor ba'i bye brag gis lugs ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi bye brag la ste /
T02TD1359E:149b-17: zhi ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi bar 'dod pa'i don ni dgos pa'o //
T02TD1359E:149b-18: gser gyi thur mas dngul la sogs pa'i snod du sbrang rtsi bzhag pa las blangs te /
T02TD1359E:149b-19: aom tsakshu sa manta tsakshu ra bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:149b-20: zhes brjod cing lugs ma'i spyan la byug cing dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:149b-21: po ti la sogs pa rnams la me long gi gzugs brnyan la de ltar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:149b-22: de nas thab khung gi me'am /
T02TD1359E:149b-27: ka ra rnams ho ma gzar ram /
T02TD1359E:149b-28: pi pi ling gi lo mas sgyed pu'i steng gi snod du blugs so //
T02TD1359E:149b-29: gtso bo'i sngags brjod cing tshos par btso bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:149b-31: aom dam by'a nam sa m'a dhi dhra na pri na ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1359E:149b-32: zhes brjod cing cid lugs ma la sogs pa lha'i gzugs brnyan du bsams la drang bar bya'o //
T02TD1359E:149b-33: zhal bsil la dri zhim po'i sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa dbul lo //
T02TD1359E:149b-34: de nas aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa /
T02TD1359E:149b-35: zhes pa'i dam tshig 'di nyan du gzhug go //
T02TD1359E:149b-36: po ti rnams la 'od dpag med shes rab dang bcas pa bstim pas /
T02TD1359E:149b-37: byang bu rnams mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD1359E:149b-38: dpe byad brgyad cu'i rang bzhin dbyangs dang gsal byed du bsgom mo //
T02TD1359E:149b-39: lha khang la sogs pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad shes rab dang bcas pa thim pas ;
T02TD1359E:149b-40: rang bzhin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
T02TD1359E:149b-43: nyan thos la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi brang khang du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1359E:150a-0: mchod rten la de ltar rnam par snang mdzad shes rab dang bcas pa thim pas de'i dbus su @150a * //
T02TD1359E:150a-1: padma'i lte ba'i steng du zla ba la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po'o //
T02TD1359E:150a-2: byang la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la ral gri dang /
T02TD1359E:150a-6: de nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD1359E:150a-7: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD1359E:150a-8: dga' ldan gnas su bzhugs pa nas //
T02TD1359E:150a-9: sgyu ma lha mdzes lhums bltams ltar //
T02TD1359E:150a-10: de ltar gzugs brnyan 'di nyid la //
T02TD1359E:150a-11: mgon po brtan par rtag bzhugs nas //
T02TD1359E:150a-12: byang chub sems ni 'phel don du //
T02TD1359E:150a-13: mchod pa la sogs 'di dag rnams //
